H0.text: how long is one full rotation of the earth. 12 hours

H1.text: how long is one full rotation of the earth. 48 hours

H2.text: how long is one full rotation of the earth. 30 days

H3.text: how long is one full rotation of the earth. about 24 hours

A4.text: A day is the time period of a full rotation of the Earth with respect to the Sun. On average, this is 24 hours (86,400 seconds).

A5.text: the mean length of a solar day on Earth has been about 86,400.002 seconds (24.000 000 6 hours).
